title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6655.1 - Reimbursement for approved OAA expenditures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6655.1 - Reimbursement for approved OAA expenditures

State Regulations

Subject to the matching requirements of this Chapter, the
office reimburses area agencies with approved area plans for approved
expenditures up to their OAA supportive services and nutrition services
allotments determined according to an intrastate funding formula set forth as
an attachment to the State plan on aging submitted to the United States

Administration on Aging. The office develops the formula after consultation
with all area agencies in New York State, publishes it for review and comment, and submits it (and any proposed revisions) to the administration on aging with
a summary of comments received. The formula is reviewed and updated at least as
often as the State plan on aging. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6655.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
